odd (number)

sentences.english: I really like the music from the Buffy musical.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡《魔法奇兵》音樂劇那集裏的音樂。

sentences.english: He suffered a back injury while filming Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984) which required surgery.
sentences.chinese: 在拍攝“魔殿奇兵”時他背部受傷需要手術。
